stadium.name: The Su'akour Bowl
stadium.description: A crude, rowdy stadium built within the half-finished, black-stone walls of the warlord Su'akour's abandoned fortress. The stands are crumbling ruins, and the entire arena perpetually stinks of the nearby sulfur marshes.

stats.pregame_ritual: Kissing their biceps and whispering words of encouragement to them.
Getting a teammate to punch them in the shoulder, hard.
Wearing their boots on the wrong feet during the warm-up.
Washing their hands with dirt.
Asking a teammate to tell them a story, but only the beginning.
Asking the referee to bless their weapon.
Finding the muddiest puddle and stomping in it with bare feet.
Staring at a single blade of grass until their eyes water.
Wiping a teammate's sweat onto their own forehead.
Attempting to communicate with birds.
Consulting a folk rhyme about the weather to predict the game's outcome.
Getting a teammate to punch them in the shoulder, hard.
Wearing their boots on the wrong feet during the warm-up.
Washing their hands with dirt.
Asking a teammate to tell them a story, but only the beginning.
Asking the referee to bless their weapon.

Finding the muddiest puddle and stomping in it with bare feet.
Attempting to communicate with birds.

stadium.name: The Glowstone Terrace
stadium.description: A massive, opulent stadium built on one of the city's main terraces, carved directly into the mountainside. The field is famously paved with polished Glowstone, and the stands overlook the bustling Confluence Market and the ongoing construction of the Guild's Skyport.

stats.pregame_ritual: Doing a terrible, clumsy dance to 'loosen the joints'.
Chugging a raw egg, shell and all.
Wearing their boots on the wrong feet during the warm-up.
Arm-wrestling the player who plays the same position on their team.
Speaking only in rhymes for the hour before the game.
Rubbing the Trollball on their armpits for 'grip'.
Wearing their boots on the wrong feet during the warm-up.
Going over the game plan drawn in the dirt with the team captain.
Covering their forearms in a sticky tree sap for 'grip'.
Eating a dandelion, stem and all.
Headbutting their own team's goal post (gently).
Wearing their boots on the wrong feet during the warm-up.
Speaking only in rhymes for the hour before the game.
Wearing their boots on the wrong feet during the warm-up.
Covering their forearms in a sticky tree sap for 'grip'.

Chugging a raw egg, shell and all.

preGame:
### üéôÔ∏è LIVE FROM THE SULFUR MARSHES: TUESDAY NIGHT TROLLBALL! üéôÔ∏è

Step right up, sports fans, and fill your lungs with the delightful, eye-watering scent of the sulfur marshes! We are coming to you live from **The Su'akour Bowl** for a Tuesday night clash that promises to be more bone-crunching than a meeting with Cyfnerth the Butcher! I'm **Nok the Corrupter**, your favorite demon of the airwaves, and I am absolutely electrified for tonight's matchup between the **Confluence Captains** and the home-team **Brimstone Fire Eaters**! üèüÔ∏èüî•

The Captains, representing the Guild of the Black Sky, are looking focused, with **Ladew Evelina** already chugging raw eggs, shells and all, while Healer **Kant Langill** is 'loosening the joints' with a dance that looks more like a seizure‚Äîit is simply marvelous! ü•öüíÉ Over in the home dugout, the Fire Eaters are embracing the grit of the ruins! **Campball Fink** is bare-foot in a mud puddle as we speak, and **Bollinger Susette** is getting his shoulders tenderized with a teammate‚Äôs fists! With the crumbling walls of this fortress threatening to drop a stone on anyone who stands still too long, we are in for a real treat! 

The Guild's boys might have the fancy gear and the backing of money-priests like **Brennen Farno**, but the Fire Eaters have the fumes and the raw, unadulterated spirit of Eponore! Let us see if the Captains can navigate the uneven ground or if they will end up as part of the ruins themselves! While the crowds might be flocking to see those popular snobs in Zmeigorod or Ravenfall, the true connoisseurs of carnage are right here in the ruins! It is Trollball time, and I could not be happier! üòàüèà
postGame:
### üèÜ OVERTIME AGONY IN THE ASHES: FIRE EATERS TRIUMPH! üèÜ

What a spectacular display of athletic carnage! The **Brimstone Fire Eaters** have emerged victorious in an overtime nail-biter, defeating the **Confluence Captains** with a final score of **3 to 2**! The Su'akour Bowl lived up to its reputation, with the noxious fumes and crumbling walls providing a perfectly hazardous backdrop for this beautiful game! If you weren't choking on the sulfur, you weren't living, folks! üèüÔ∏èüî•

The action started fast and heavy when **Nigel Rothmuller** decided he did not like the look of **Carnahan Laud‚Äôs** face, tackling her so hard she had to be carried off the field! It was a masterpiece of physical persuasion that set the tone for the entire match! Nigel clearly consulted his folk rhymes today, and they told him to choose violence! üëäüí•

Shortly after, **Selimah Tully** joined the fun by sending **Caves Cestar** to the dirt with an injury that would make even the stoic **Sir Tanos** wince! It's a wonder Tanos can even see the game through all that 'boldness,' but Tully showed no mercy to the Guild's golden boys! The Fire Eaters drew first blood on the scoreboard when **Campball Fink** charged into the end zone for a magnificent dunk! The home crowd went wild, though that might have been the sulfur gas talking! üëÉüòµ‚Äçüí´

But those Captains from the Guild of the Black Sky showed they have more than just deep pockets! **Ladew Evelina**, fueled by that raw egg she ate earlier, pulled off a staggering two-point shot from the home field! It was a display of accuracy that **Chairman Garon Ironrock** would probably try to tax if he could! Just a reminder that money can't buy taste, but it can apparently buy a decent arm! üéØüí∞

As the game went into overtime, the violence only escalated! **Caves Cestar** returned to the field with a grudge, immediately taking out **Orlina Jerrine** and **Nigel Rothmuller** in a flurry of revenge! It was like watching a beautiful, bloody ballet in the mud! I haven't seen that much righteous anger since **Morgwae** was exiled! ü©∞ü©∏

Healer **Raphael Miyasawa** was working at a fever pitch, dragging players back from the brink of the void just to throw them back into the meat grinder! That is the spirit of the Everwar we love to see! Who needs peace when you can have a dedicated professional whispering words of encouragement to their biceps while stitching your liver back in? üíâüí™

Even when **Carnahan Laud** managed to retaliate and take out the scoring threat of **Campball Fink**, the Fire Eaters refused to buckle under the pressure! The uneven ground of the stadium seemed to favor the home team as the Captains struggled to maintain their footing. It's hard to look opulent when you're face-down in a sulfur puddle, isn't it? üèîÔ∏èü§¢

The defensive struggle was real, folks! We saw **Nachison Icken** and **Wylde Jutta** throwing themselves into tackles with the reckless abandon of a rogue escaping a circus‚Äîlooking at you, **Sawyer**! The Captains' **Vonni Geoff** even managed to snag an interception off **Orlina Jerrine**, but the momentum shifted back faster than a Fey's mood! üÉèüåÄ

The climax of this glorious struggle came when **Oona Jane** delivered a pass that was smoother than a lie from a Fey hater! She found **Bollinger Susette** in the end zone, who slammed the troll head home for the winning dunk! The ruins erupted! Bollinger must have really appreciated that pre-game shoulder punch, because he hit that end zone with the force of a falling fortress wall! üèÜüí•

What a day for Brimstone! It is a shame the **Haven Lights** were not here to see it; they probably would have spent the whole time crying about the 'sanctity of life' and trying to heal everyone for free. Disgusting! This is the kind of grit that keeps Osterra spinning! üïØÔ∏èü§Æ

To the **Confluence Captains**, better luck next time‚Äîmaybe try rubbing more sap on your arms or asking **Nikos Thanae** for some 'benevolent' tips on how to actually hit something! To the Fire Eaters, enjoy your victory in the ruins! This is **Nok the Corrupter**, reminding you that if you are not bleeding, you are not playing! Goodnight, you beautiful monsters! üòàüéôÔ∏èüñ§
